name: Not Such A Merry Christmas
description:
This is made for the ❄️ Great Winter Game Jam - 2020 ❄️ - itch.io

***DISCLAIMER: This Has Pixel Art Blood. You Have Been Warned***

Summary: 

Not Such A Merry Christmas is about a rogue, evil Santa, who must destroy the youth in one minute. There is only one goal; destruction!

How to play: 

Cursor: Moves Santa

Left/Right Mouse: Shoots out Blades

How does this fit along with the topic:

This fits with the topic Winter because you control an evil Santa
